name: Blackberry Pomegranate Quinoa Parfait
author: truRoots(R)
summary: Loaded with fresh fruit and fruit spread, these whole grain and chia seed parfaits with creamy Greek yogurt make delicious snacks or desserts.
ingredients: ½ cup Santa Cruz Organic® Blackberry Pomegranate Fruit Spread
1 cup cooked truRoots® Accents® Organic Sprouted Quinoa Trio
½ teaspoon grated fresh lemon peel
4 slice (1/4" thick) (blank)s lemon slices, for garnish
directions: Combine fruit spread and chia seeds in medium bowl
Combine yogurt and lemon peel in small bowl
Divide half of quinoa mixture evenly into 4 parfait glasses
Top quinoa mixture with 1/3 cup yogurt
Divide and spoon remaining quinoa mixture over yogurt
Top with dollop of yogurt and lemon slice
